questions.question_text: What IPv6 extension header can be used to provide encryption and data confidentiality?

choices.C: Either a SSL VPN or an IPsec VPN can be established between two FortiGate devices.
choices.B: Both SSL VPNs and IPsec VPNs are standard protocols.
choices.D: Either a SSL VPN or an IPsec VPN can be established between an end-user workstation and a FortiGate device.
choices.A: SSL VPN creates a HTTPS connection. IPsec does not.

questions.question_text: Which two statements are true about IPsec VPNs and SSL VPNs? (Choose two.)
What is a valid reason for using session based authentication instead of IP based authentication in a FortiGate web proxy solution?

discussion.content:
The valid reason should be A according to https://docs.fortinet.com/document/fortiproxy/2.0.2/fortiproxy-authentication-guide/129531/authentication-methods.

Please check and update otherwise, delete my comment

choices.D: Proxy users are authenticated via RADIUS.
choices.C: There are multiple users sharing the same IP address.
choices.B: Proxy users are authenticated via FSSO.
choices.A: Users are required to manually enter their credentials each time they connect to a different web site.

questions.question_text: Which web filtering inspection mode inspects DNS traffic?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Flow-Based is the only web filtering mode on the list
https://docs.fortinet.com/document/fortigate/6.2.15/cookbook/469806/inspection-mode-differences-for-web-filter
